dialogue.htmlContent:
Lying flat on the floor in this area of the enclosure is the teleportation pad which you and Claire arrived on. Lacking the specially-shaped essence cells which the pad requires in order to function, you and Claire are unable to use it to return to the Enforcer post in Submission.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_claireEnclosureEscaped)) There's really nothing more that can be done here; you're going to have to escape by sneaking through the warehouse. #ELSE [claire.speech(It's a shame that these things can't be powered directly by aura, or even by absorbing freed essences,)] Claire sighs as she tinkers with the control panel, [claire.speech(I really don't think I'm going to be able to get this working again...)] #ENDIF

Doing as Claire asks, you kneel down and start looking over the side of the teleportation pad's base. Sure enough, after just a moment spent searching for it, you spot the round hatch which Claire is after, and draw her attention to it, [pc.speech(I think I've found that 'essence port' you're looking for.)]

Rushing over to kneel down beside you, the short cat-girl lets out a deep sigh of relief, [claire.speech(Thank goodness! I always carry a couple of spare essence cells with me, so once I've inserted one, this pad should activate again and we can get out of here!)]

Opening the round hatch, your Enforcer companion then reaches into a pocket on her armoured vest. Obviously finding it empty, she lets out a little huff, before checking the pocket beside it. Finding that one empty too, she starts frantically patting down and searching every pocket and pouch on her uniform. Finding each one as empty as the last, her breathing starts getting heavier and heavier, until finally she lets out a wail of despair. Allowing her hands to drop down onto her thick thighs, she sinks down onto her large, rounded ass and cries, [claire.speech(This can't be happening! We're going to be in so much trouble! I-I might even lose my job... Or even get arrested! What if they enslave us?! I don't want to be a sex slave! These SWORD guys aren't like regular Enforcers; they're trigger-happy maniacs! This is a disaster! What'll we do?!)]

Sensing that she's going to start hyper-ventilating if you don't take immediate action, you wonder what you should do to get Claire to calm down...

Seeking to remind Claire of her usual happy, confident self, you take hold of her shoulders and sternly state, [pc.speech(Pull yourself together, Claire! We're not going to get out of here by panicking and feeling sorry for ourselves!)]

Taking a deep breath, the cat-girl allows a smile to return to her face, and, joining you in standing up, she says, [claire.speech(You're right. Thanks, [pc.name], I don't know what came over me. I'm sure there must be some way out of here, and maybe there aren't even any SWORD guards in here. We might be able to escape without any trouble at all.)]

[pc.speech(That's the spirit,)] you say, [pc.speech(and if worse comes to worst, we can always climb over these crates...)]

Looking up at the towering stacks of crates all around you, you wonder if the short, top-heavy cat-girl would really be able to scale them, but before you have too much time to think about such a thing, she says, [claire.speech(I'll see if I can get this pad working somehow. Could you try to look for a gap in these crates or something?)]

Replying in the affirmative, you leave Claire to tinker with the teleportation pad, before starting to take a closer look at the walls of crates surrounding you...

Seeking to calm Claire down by reassuring her that everything's ok, you place one [pc.hand] on her shoulder and say, [pc.speech(Come on, Claire! It's not that hopeless; I'm sure we can find a way out of here, or even get that pad working again!)]

Taking a deep breath, the cat-girl slowly allows a smile to return to her face, and, joining you in standing up, she says, [claire.speech(I guess... I mean, there's got to be a way out somewhere, and maybe there aren't even any SWORD guards in here. We might be able to escape without any trouble at all.)]

[pc.speech(That's the spirit,)] you say, [pc.speech(and if worse comes to worst, we can always climb over these crates...)]

Looking up at the towering stacks of crates all around you, you wonder if the short, top-heavy cat-girl would really be able to scale them, but before you have too much time to think about such a thing, she says, [claire.speech(I'll see if I can get this pad working somehow. Could you try to look for a gap in these crates or something?)]

Replying in the affirmative, you leave Claire to tinker with the teleportation pad, before starting to take a closer look at the walls of crates surrounding you...

Seeking to calm Claire down, you shuffle a little closer to her and, wrapping your [pc.arms] around her, you pull her into a big hug.

[claire.speech(H-Hey, I'm not that far gone, there's no need to hug me or anything,)] she objects, but despite her words, you can tell from the soft tone of her voice that she's not really disliking the experience. Taking a deep breath, the cat-girl waits for you to release her and back off, before joining you in standing up and saying, [claire.speech(Thanks for the support, [pc.name], but I'm not really that fragile... A-Anyway, I suppose that there's got to be a way out of here somewhere, and maybe there aren't even any SWORD guards in here. We might be able to escape without any trouble at all.)]

[pc.speech(Well, if worse comes to worst, we can always climb over these crates,)] you suggest.

Looking up at the towering stacks of crates all around you, you wonder if the short, top-heavy cat-girl would really be able to scale them, but before you have too much time to think about such a thing, she says, [claire.speech(I'll see if I can get this pad working somehow. Could you try to look for a gap in these crates or something?)]

Replying in the affirmative, you leave Claire to tinker with the teleportation pad, before starting to take a closer look at the walls of crates surrounding you...

Towering stacks of wooden crates surround you on all four sides, forming what is sure to present an all-but-impassable barrier to your top-heavy cat-girl companion. A closer look at these containers reveals that each one has been stamped both with a serial number and with the words 'SWORD: Special Weapons and Operations Response Department'.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_claireEnclosureEscaped)) You can't see any gap at all in the stacks of crates in this area. It seems as though the only way in or out of this small enclosure is via the passage you opened up by moving those shelves... #ELSE You can't see any gap at all in the stacks of crates in this area, but surely there must be a way out somewhere nearby... #ENDIF

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_claireEnclosureEscaped))

By pulling the wheeled shelving units back into the crate-encircled enclosure, you've managed to open up a path linking it to the warehouse proper. Although it was in this location where you were fortunate enough to find a fabled spell book containing the secrets of teleportation, these shelves really don't seem to contain anything else of value.

[claire.speech(Come on, we've got to get out of here!)] Claire hisses, motioning with one hand for you to come and join her as she waits for you by the opening in the wall of crates.

#ELSE

Although not visible from where you initially teleported in due to the angle at which you were viewing it, there's a ceiling-high gap in the crates in this particular corner of the enclosure. Unfortunately, someone seems to have pushed several wheeled shelving units into this breach, effectively blocking off your current location from the rest of the warehouse.

If you were to pull these shelves out, you could probably open up a way to escape...

#ENDIF

With only these wheeled shelving units blocking what looks to be the way out, you step over towards the nearest one, and, grabbing it by the end, start to pull it out. #IF(pc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE)<5) Despite it having wheels, you're so weak that you're completely unable to move it. Thankfully, having seen what it is you're doing, Claire quickly walks over to give you a helping hand.

[claire.speech(That pad's definitely not going to work without the proper essence cell,)] she says, grabbing the end of the shelf, [claire.speech(So this is the way out? These things are heavier than they look I guess? Or not...)]

With absolute ease, the cat-girl gets the shelf moving, and in just a few moments she's wheeled it fully back into the enclosure, thereby opening a path from your current location into the rest of the warehouse. It not being her intention to show you up like that, she says, [claire.speech(Hey, don't worry about not being able to move it; it was pretty heavy, and I'm stronger than I look!)] #ELSE Although you're able to get it moving with absolute ease, the front set of wheels suddenly catch on the side of a crate, and the whole shelving unit comes to a shuddering halt. Having seen what it is you're doing, Claire quickly walks over to give you a helping hand.

[claire.speech(That pad's definitely not going to work without the proper essence cell,)] she says, walking past you to bend down and free the shelf's wheels, before continuing, [claire.speech(So this is the way out? Let's get moving then!)]

Agreeing with the once-again happy cat-girl, you wheel the shelving unit fully back into the enclosure, thereby opening a path from your current location into the rest of the warehouse. #ENDIF

Along with the other two still sitting in the gap, this shelving unit looks to be full of nothing more than dusty old accounting books. As you and Claire start to move through the opening you've just created, however, you see a book lying on the floor which is very unlike all these others. Instantly recognising it as a spell book, you bend down to pick it up, and feel your eyes widening in surprise as you see that it contains detailed instructions on how to cast the very spell which got you into this whole mess; 'teleport'.

[claire.speech(Hey, what's that you've found? It must have fallen out of the shelf as it was moving,)] Claire says, stepping up beside you. As she sees what it is, the tone of her voice instantly changes from one of curiosity to one of alarm, and she hisses, [claire.speech(A teleport spell book?! Y-You can't take that! What are you doing?! That's a forbidden spell; only lilin or the highest-ranking Enforcers are allowed those!)]

[pc.speech(But if I can quickly learn it, maybe I'd be able to teleport back to your Enforcer post and pick up one of those essence cells, and then come back to save you,)] you suggest.

Torn between her duty as an Enforcer and the prospect of escaping this whole mess the two of you are in, the little cat-girl paces back and forth for a moment before turning towards you and letting out a defeated sigh. Placing her hands on her wide hips, she pouts at you as she says, [claire.speech(Fine... Just don't you ever tell anyone that I allowed you to do this... A-And anyway, you haven't broken the law until you attempt to learn that spell, so if I don't see you doing it, then I'm not responsible for having to arrest you!)]

Having found a solution to her moral dilemma, Claire turns her back on you, before hissing over her shoulder for you to hurry up. Not wanting to point out the flaws in Claire's logic, you turn your attention back to the book still in your hands...
With the possibility of a SWORD guard discovering this enclosure, you skim through the spellbook as quickly as possible...

Thanks to your natural affinity with the arcane, you're able to learn how to cast teleport very quickly, and once you feel confident enough to try it out, you tap Claire on the shoulder and let her know that you're ready.

[claire.speech(Ok, so just teleport back to the room we came from, and then go back into the adjoining office,)] Claire instructs, [claire.speech(Lucy should be on duty now, and she owes me a huge favour, so just ask her for a couple of essence cells, and say that this is in return for when I helped her with the 'alligator incident'.)]

[pc.speech(Ok, here I go,)] you say. Following the book's instructions, you visualise the room back in Submission's Enforcer post, before casting the teleport spell. A flash of purple light instantly surrounds you, but instead of being instantaneously transported to your destination, you feel yourself being pulled back by some strange, powerful force. As the light fades, you discover that you're still standing in exactly the same place as you were a moment ago.

[claire.speech(I should have known there'd be a teleport inhibition device in here...)] Claire sighs as she sees that your spell failed. Bringing her palm up to her forehead, she whines in frustration, [claire.speech(Now not only are we in serious trouble for the unauthorised teleport and trespassing in a SWORD installation, but I've also gone and let you learn a forbidden spell for no reason!)]

[pc.speech(A teleport inhibition device? So that's what pulled me back?)] you ask, relieved to discover that it wasn't your fault that the teleport spell failed.

[claire.speech(Yeah, it's not like there are many people who can teleport, but a lot of places still have them as a security precaution. I was hoping that they'd not have bothered to put one in this old warehouse,)] Claire replies, before shaking her head free of negative thoughts and continuing, [claire.speech(Anyway, it looks like we'll just have to get out of here the old fashioned way. I'll follow you, so lead on. Oh, and watch out for SWORD guards...)]

The paths leading through the warehouse are flanked on both sides by towering stacks of wooden crates. In some areas they're at such a height that they're almost touching the bright arcane lights which hang down from the corrugated steel roof high overhead. As you pass them, you notice that every single one of these crates is stamped with a serial number and accompanying text, reading 'SWORD: Special Weapons and Operations Response Department'.

#IF(RND.nextInt(100)<15)

#IF(claire.getLust()>75) [claire.speech( [style.random(I'm so horny...|Can't think... So horny...|I'm so turned on right now...|You know, you're really hot...|I need a good, hard fuck...)] )] Claire [style.random(moans|sighs)]. #ELSE [claire.speech( [style.random(This place is huge...|It's like a labyrinth in here...|I'm sure we'll be out of here soon...|Just watch out for those SWORD guards...|How long have we even been in here?)] )] Claire [style.random(whispers|hisses)]. #ENDIF

#ENDIF

The area to your north looks like this warehouse's only exit. Although you can see that it's being guarded by no less than [style.colourBad(four SWORD Enforcers)], [style.colourMinorGood(you're confident that you can move closer without alerting them)].

Almost immediately as you start moving into the warehouse, you see that the path before you forks off to the left. Wanting to make sure that the way is clear, you slowly move up to the junction and carefully peek around the corner.

Just like the rest of the warehouse that you've seen so far, the path which you find yourself looking down is flanked on both sides by towering stacks of wooden crates. What's different about the scene before you, however, is that there's [npc.a_race] Enforcer standing guard about [unit.lSize(2000)] away from you. Thankfully, [npc.sheIs] currently preoccupied with throwing darts into the side of a nearby crate, and hasn't noticed either you or Claire, who has snuck up behind you and joined you in peeking around the corner.

[claire.speech(That's a member of SWORD, all right,)] the cat-girl whispers in your ear, [claire.speech(just look at all that gear [npc.sheIs] wearing...)]

Sure enough, as you take another look at the [npc.race] Enforcer, you take note of the fact that [npc.sheIs] not only wearing a very militarised uniform, complete with armoured vest and helmet, but [npc.she] also has what looks to be a rifle of some sort slung over [npc.her] shoulder. Although [npc.sheIs] no threat at the moment, due to being concerned only with trying to score a bullseye on her makeshift dartboard, you imagine that [npc.she]'d be a very dangerous opponent if you were to drawn into a fight with [npc.herHim].

[claire.speech(SWORD are known for being trigger-happy maniacs at the best of times,)] Claire whispers with a sense of urgency in her voice, [claire.speech(There's no way we can sneak past [npc.herHim], and [npc.she]'ll probably just shoot us if [npc.she] sees us. Come on, let's find another way around...)]

Realising that you'll end up having to fight the [npc.race] if you move any closer to [npc.herHim], you suppose that it would be the safer option to do as Claire suggests and find another route by which the two of you can escape...

Thinking that Claire's overwhelming lust really needs to be dealt with, you turn to her and say, [pc.speech(It looks like there's a place to hide behind some of these crates...)]

Immediately picking up on what it is you mean by that, the busty little cat-girl practically jumps with excitement as she rushes forwards and grabs you by the [pc.hand]. Pulling you over into the recess which you just mentioned, she turns towards you and squeals, [claire.speech(Yes! Please, I'm going to go crazy if I don't get some release soon!)]

All too happy to help her with her problem, you step up to Claire and pull her into a deep, passionate kiss. Her huge, [claire.cupSize]-cup breasts press into your chest as the two of you thrust your tongues into each other's mouths, and, grabbing your hand, the horny cat-girl guides your [pc.fingers] down between her legs. As you start stroking her groin, she pulls back from the kiss and desperately pants, [claire.speech(Fuck... This is so naughty! Just think; we could be caught at any moment! Oh, fuck! This is turning me on so much!)]

Claire's sudden passion seems to be more than just the result of being exposed to the arcane lightning globe, and you realise that this whole situation must have awoken a hidden desire for having risky sex deep within her. Leaning back against the crates in your little hiding spot, the busty cat-girl once again pulls you into her, before breathing heavily into your ear, [claire.speech(Come on, fuck me already!)]

Claire leans heavily back against the crates, happily panting, [claire.speech(Fuck... I've never had sex quite like that before...)]

Telling your partner that you enjoyed it as well, the two of you then set about getting your clothing back in order. Despite the fact that she should have got her lust back under control by now, Claire seems to be rather excited by the situation you're in, and she cheekily leans in to plant a kiss on your cheek, before saying, [claire.speech(Once we've escaped, we've got to do something like this again, ok? Perhaps when you visit me down in Submission, we could do it in an office, knowing that someone could walk in on us at any moment...)]

Realising that you've definitely awoken some kind of risky sex fetish in this cat-girl Enforcer, you tell her that there will be plenty of opportunities to play out her fantasies in the future, but for now, you need to focus on escaping from this place. Agreeing with your assessment, Claire falls in behind you once again as the two of you set off into the warehouse once more...

Wondering if Claire is still feeling turned-on by your current dangerous situation, you ask her if she'd like to go for another round behind some nearby crates.

Obviously excited by the thought of doing such a thing, she bites her lip and lets out a horny little whine, but, getting a hold of herself, she shakes her head and explains, [claire.speech(I'd love to, but if we spend too long in here, people are going to start to notice that I'm missing. After we've escaped from this place, you can always visit me down in Submission. We could do it in an office down there, knowing that someone could walk in on us at any moment...)]

Having to make do with her offer of more sex once the two of you have escaped from this place, you prepare to set off into the warehouse once again...

This particular section of the warehouse appears to have been marked as a temporary storage bay of sorts, and alongside several lift dollies, there are a half-dozen or so crates waiting to be carted off and stacked in their proper location. While all the other crates in this warehouse are firmly sealed shut, the wooden lids on these ones have only been loosely closed, which, if you wanted to, would enable you to search through them.

This particular section of the warehouse appears to have been marked as a temporary storage bay of sorts, and alongside several lift dollies, there are a half-dozen or so crates waiting to be carted off and stacked in their proper location. While all the other crates in this warehouse are firmly sealed shut, the wooden lids on these ones have only been loosely closed, which enabled you and Claire to search through them. Having already done this once already, there'd be no point in spending time searching though them for a second time.
The way some of the crates have been stacked up in this area has created a hidden recess in which you and Claire could hide...

Wondering what could be contained within the unsealed crates sitting before you, you step forwards and start searching through them. As you do so, Claire starts protesting, pointing out how she should be arresting you for what you're doing, but after you tell her that you might find something which could help the two of you escape from this warehouse, she reluctantly joins you in your search.

#IF(RND.nextInt(100)<50) Unfortunately, most of the boxes turn out to contain nothing but stacks of mundane paperwork. In one of the last crates you check, however, you do find something worth taking, but you're not sure if it's going to be of any use in escaping from the warehouse... #ELSE Unfortunately, most of the boxes turn out to contain nothing but stacks of mundane paperwork. In one of the last crates which your cat-girl Enforcer companion checks, however, she does find something worth taking, but as she hands it over to you, you're not sure if it's going to be of any use in escaping from the warehouse... #ENDIF

This particular section of the warehouse appears to have been marked as a temporary storage bay of sorts, and alongside several lift dollies, there are a half-dozen or so crates waiting to be carted off and stacked in their proper location. One of these wooden crates has a corner broken off of it, revealing that it contains a curious golden ark. Pushing back the lid, you see that it's covered in locks and sealed with an immeasurably-powerful arcane spell. You get the feeling that an adventurous archaeologist would insist that it belongs in a museum...

While all the other crates in this warehouse are firmly sealed shut, the wooden lids on these ones have only been loosely closed, which, if you wanted to, would enable you to search through them.

This particular section of the warehouse appears to have been marked as a temporary storage bay of sorts, and alongside several lift dollies, there are a half-dozen or so crates waiting to be carted off and stacked in their proper location. One of these wooden crates has a corner broken off of it, revealing that it contains a curious golden ark. Pushing back the lid, you see that it's covered in locks and sealed with an immeasurably-powerful arcane spell. You get the feeling that an adventurous archaeologist would insist that it belongs in a museum...

While all the other crates in this warehouse are firmly sealed shut, the wooden lids on these ones have only been loosely closed, which enabled you and Claire to search through them. Having already done this once already, there'd be no point in spending time searching though them for a second time.

Solid red lines have been marked out on the floor of this particular part of the warehouse, and within the area which they encompass, you see that the words 'Restricted Area' have been spray-painted in regular intervals. Within this specially-designated zone, you see that there's a single wooden crate waiting to be collected and carted off some other part of the warehouse. On the side of this solitary container, you see that the words 'Top Secret' have been burned into the pale brown wood.

Although Claire would probably object, there's nothing really stopping you from walking up to this curious crate and taking a look inside. Perhaps it contains some sort of powerful artefact which would help the two of you to escape?

Solid red lines have been marked out on the floor of this particular part of the warehouse, and within the area which they encompass, you see that the words 'Restricted Area' have been spray-painted in regular intervals. The crate marked as 'Top Secret', which contained the arcane lightning globe, is sitting in the middle of this forbidden zone, and as you were careful to leave it exactly as you found it, you don't think that whoever carts it off into storage will discover that its contents are missing...

There's no way that you're not going to take the opportunity to search through a 'Top Secret' crate locked away in a guarded warehouse like this. Stepping forwards over the solid red line that's painted on the floor, you enter the 'Restricted Area' and head directly over to this curious container.

[claire.speech(What are you doing?)] Claire hisses, before puffing up her chest, placing her hands on her hips, and continuing to scold you, [claire.speech(Can't you read?! That's a restricted area!)]

Having already expected this response, you turn to face the pouting cat-girl and explain, [pc.speech(This might just contain something that can get us out of here. You do want to escape from here, right?)]

[claire.speech(Of course I do!)] she responds, marching forwards beside you so that she can continue objecting without having to shout, [claire.speech(I also don't want to be charged with entering a restricted area and looting some top secret crate! Anyway, we don't have time to argue; just do what you've got to do and then let's get going!)]

[pc.speech(It'll be faster if you help,)] you say, stepping up to the crate and starting to pull open the lid.

[claire.speech(Oh, fine!)] she replies, grabbing the other end of the lid and helping you to lift it up and off the top of the crate.

With the container now open, the two of you step forwards and peer inside. Rather disappointingly, all you see are stacks of brown paper folders, each one stamped with 'Top Secret' in big red lettering. Your companion, however, notices something more to the crate's contents, and, pushing some of these folders out of the way, she reveals a small metal box sitting beside a dozen or so bottles of swirling arcane essence. Reaching inside, the curious cat-girl retrieves the metal box, before turning it over in her hands and making a puzzled expression.

[claire.speech(I wonder what's in here,)] she muses, her objections of a moment ago quickly forgotten as she's overcome by curiosity. Before you can say or do anything to stop her, she unfastens the box's latch, before quickly opening the hinged lid and retrieving what's stored inside. As she brings it up to her face to take a closer look, you see that the mysterious object that she's holding is a small, crystal globe, no larger than a golf ball. Suspended in the very centre of it, there's a faint ball of glowing white light, but other than that, there doesn't seem to be anything particularly spectacular or dangerous about it.

[claire.speech(Is this all there is?)] the cat-girl asks, [claire.speech(It looks like some kind of arcane Yule decoration or something. What's so top secret about- Eek!)]

Claire's question is interrupted as the small globe suddenly bursts into life in a spectacular fashion. One moment containing nothing but a seemingly-inert ball of arcane light, a split second later it's filled with dancing streaks of bright purple arcane lightning. While these arcing flashes look to be safely contained within the globe, their sudden appearance is nevertheless enough to make Claire jump, and in her panic, she throws it back into the wooden crate with considerable force. Unfortunately, this throw manages to directly strike the bottles of arcane essence stored within the box, and as several of them smash into pieces, a huge flash of purple-hued lightning is discharged from the little crystal globe.

[claire.speech(Eek!)] Claire cries, dropping down into a crouch and shielding her head from the burst of energy. Of course, such a reaction does nothing to shield the cat-girl from the arcane lightning, and, similarly, there's nothing you can do to protect yourself from it either. Like a more focused version of a naturally-occurring arcane storm, this energy discharge doesn't cause any physical harm, but instead, you feel yourself starting to get aroused.

Thankfully, this lightning discharge only lasts for a moment, and it rapidly dissipates before you're affected too strongly by its effects. Claire, on the other hand, seems to have been hit by a much stronger burst, and with a horny whine, she drops one hand down into her trousers and starts touching herself...

Concerned with how Claire has suddenly been affected by the arcane lightning, you step forwards and ask her if she's ok. As though woken from a dream, she seems to suddenly become aware of what she's doing, and, pulling her hand out of her trousers, she blushes and stammers, [claire.speech(Y-Yes, I-I'm fine! That lightning's just... Well... You can see how it's made me feel!)]

Before you can suggest a solution to her problem, she pushes herself away from the crate and takes a deep breath. Assuming her favourite pose, she places her hands on her wide hips and states, [claire.speech(I-I can control myself! Come on, we need to get out of here!)]

From the way she's starting hungrily at your body, combined with her blushing cheeks and the little whimpering moans she starts to make, you can tell that it's taking everything Claire's got to keep her lust under control. Satisfied that she's not going to do anything crazy that would alert the SWORD guards to your presence, you shift your attention back to the crate, and the curious globe that's sitting inside of it.

Miraculously, despite having shattered a half-dozen or so vials of arcane essence, the lightning globe doesn't seem to have even the slightest scratch upon it, and what's more, it seems to have reverted to its inactive state, and once again contains just a seemingly-inert ball of white arcane light. Reaching inside the box, you pick up the small, golf-ball-sized globe, and as you lift it up to take a closer look at it, purple flashes of arcane lightning once again start streaking out from the central core.

[claire.speech(I-Is that thing safe to touch?)] Claire asks, her voice still a little shaky as she desperately tries to keep her lust under control.

[pc.speech(Yes, I don't think it's going to discharge again without having some kind of arcane energy channelled into it,)] you reply, your natural affinity for the arcane instincively telling you that this is the case. Deciding to take this lightning globe with you, you tell your cat-girl companion, [pc.speech(Perhaps it will be useful in helping us to escape from this place.)]

Looking back into the crate, you see that a few of the bottled essences are still intact. #IF(!pc.hasQuest(QUEST_LINE_SIDE_ENCHANTMENT_DISCOVERY)) You get the feeling that if you were to open them, you'd be able to absorb the energy contained within, and could then channel that energy into the lightning globe in order to shoot a single bolt at a target. #ELSE You get the feeling that arcane essences must be used as some sort of ammunition for this curious weapon, and that by channelling them into the lightning globe, you'd be able to shoot a single bolt at a target. #ENDIF Picking them up, you add them to your inventory, then, after firmly closing the lid of the crate, you turn back towards Claire and tell her that the two of you should continue on your way.

[claire.speech(~Mmm!~)] she whines, and you see that one of her hands has found its way back down the front of her trousers again, while the other is busily groping her huge breasts. Suddenly becoming aware of what it is she's doing, she quickly stops playing with herself, and with her cheeks flushing bright red, she insists, [claire.speech(I-I'll be fine! I can control myself! Let's just get out of here!)]

While you're convinced that she will indeed be able to control herself, you get the feeling that it wouldn't take much to convince her to have sex with you...
Trusting that Claire will be able to control herself, you step back from the 'Top Secret' crate and prepare to continue on your way...

Instead of the usual wooden crates which fill the rest of the warehouse, this particular section is home to dozens of wheeled shelving units, of the same sort which were blocking your way when you first arrived here. With one last evil laugh, [npc.she] heads off to exchange words with the Enforcer who locked you into the stocks, before heading off back to her post at the SWORD warehouse. As [npc.she] departs, the Enforcer on duty walks up to you, before making some marks on your set of stocks with a white chalk. Turning towards the crowd, he says, [genericMale.speech(Right, [pc.sheIs] all yours.)]

As the Enforcer heads off back to his post, the first members of the public wanting to use you step forwards...

You look up to see two figures before you; [npc.name(a)] and [npc2.name(a)]. Obviously knowing one another quite well, [npc.name(the)] turns towards [npc.her] friend and, with a big grin on [npc.her] face, asks, [npc.speech(You want to use [pc.her] mouth then?)]

[npc2.speech(Yeah, you can fuck [pc.herHim], I'll use [pc.her] mouth,)] [npc2.name] replies, grinning down at you as [npc2.she] steps up in front of you.

[npc.speech(I bet I can last longer than you can,)] [npc.name] teases [npc.her] partner, stepping around behind you before reaching down to grope your [pc.ass+].

[npc2.speech(Yeah, sure,)] [npc2.name] replies, and with no regard as to what you think or want, the two of them prepare to start fucking you...

[npc2.speech(Be a good [pc.girl] and get that tongue of yours working,)] [npc2.name] says, grinning down at you, [npc2.speech(The last slave who gave me oral was really shit at it, so I'm hoping you'll do better.)]

[npc.speech(You're too fussy,)] [npc.name] replies from somewhere behind you, before reaching down to give your [pc.ass+] another squeeze, followed by a light slap. [npc.speech(You know you can't expect much from the trash locked up for public use.)]

[npc2.speech(I guess,)] [npc2.name] replies, before looking down at you again and asking, [npc2.speech(but you'll at least try to satisfy me, won't you?)]

Not bothering to wait for an answer, the pair move forwards and prepare to start fucking you...

Having had their fun with you, [npc.name] and [npc2.name] put their clothes back on, and without even a backwards glance, they walk off together, speculating on the sorts of slaves that'll be available for them to fuck tomorrow.

Just as you're wondering what will happen next, another pair step up before you, and, to your amazement, you look up to see that it's none other than Claire and the Enforcer overseer. With a deep sigh, your busty cat-girl friend places her hands on her hips and states, [claire.speech(Yes, that's [pc.herHim]. Please release [pc.herHim] at once.)]

Doing as he's told, the Enforcer wipes the chalk markings off your stocks, before unlocking and removing the heavy padlock. Pulling up the wooden device, he frees your head and [pc.hands], before turning to Claire and saying, [genericMale.speech(Right, there you go. As I said, it was SWORD who told me to do it. I'm not exactly going to say no to them.)]

[claire.speech(Yes, yes, I know,)] the cat-girl impatiently says, before moving forwards and helping you to your [pc.feet]. As the Enforcer overseer walks off, Claire asks, [claire.speech(Are you ok? I'm sorry about how long it took for me to get here; I had to get your release papers signed by my boss.)]

#IF(pc.getFetishDesire(FETISH_NON_CON_SUB).isPositive()) After telling Claire that you actually quite enjoyed the experience, you thank her for giving you enough time to get a good fuck, before asking how she managed to escape. #ELSE You tell Claire that despite your harrowing experience, you think that after getting cleaned up and having some rest you'll be able to recover. Thanking her for rescuing you, you then ask how she managed to escape. #ENDIF

[claire.speech(Well, after you left, the guards at the entrance ran off to go and check on the others back in the warehouse,)] Claire explains, [claire.speech(so I was able to hide behind some crates and then sneak out after they'd gone.)]

Spending the next few minutes fussing over you and making sure that you're going to be alright, Claire eventually lets out a little sigh, and, placing her hands on her hips, says, [claire.speech(I hate to leave you like this, but I really need to get back and report to my boss that everything's ok. Don't worry, I'm not giving him all the details of what happened in the warehouse. If he found out about you knowing teleport, we'd both be locked up here...)]

With that, the cat-girl gives you one last smile, before turning and dashing off to get back to work. Stepping away from the stocks, you wonder what to do now...

After just five minutes since leaving the warehouse, you and the [npc.race] Enforcer finally reach your destination, which, as you suspected, turns out to be the cells in the Enforcer Headquarters. Leading you into a small office situated at the end of the cells' corridor, your captor calls out to the Enforcer assigned to guard duty here, [npc.speech(Hey, constable, I've got a prisoner here. You got room for [pc.herHim] for the next twenty-four hours or so?)]

[genericMale.speech(Sure, let me help you lock [pc.herHim] up,)] the Enforcer replies, before leading you over to an unoccupied cell. Pushing you inside, he then shuts and locks the iron-barred door behind you, before turning to the [npc.race] and saying, [genericMale.speech(There you go, [npc.she]'ll be safe and sound in there until you come back to process [pc.herHim].)]

[npc.speech(Right, my Inspector should call in tomorrow to sort [pc.herHim] out,)] [npc.name] replies, before turning and exiting via the way the two of you arrived, leaving you alone in your cell.

Once the guard has returned to his office, you attempt to teleport out of your prison, but, just as you expected, there must be another teleport inhibition device in the Enforcer Headquarters, as your spell once again doesn't work. Turning back to look at your cell, you take note of the fact that the walls, floor, and ceiling are all made of solid concrete, and with just a simple concrete platform to serve as a bed, there's nothing to do in here except for waiting to be rescued.

Thankfully, after a tedious couple of hours waiting in your cell, you hear Claire's distinctive voice echoing down from further up the corridor, [claire.speech(Yes, I know it was SWORD that wanted [pc.herHim] locked up. Nobody's blaming you, let's just get [pc.herHim] released as soon as possible, ok?)]

After just a moment more, Claire and the Enforcer guard appear outside your cell door, and after getting him to unlock it, Claire beckons you to follow her out, asking, [claire.speech(Are you ok? I'm sorry about how long it took for me to get here; I had to get your release papers signed by my boss.)]

After telling your saviour that you're ok, you ask her how she managed to escape from the warehouse.

[claire.speech(Well, after you left, those four guards at the entrance ran off into the warehouse to check on their comrades,)] Claire explains as she leads you out of the Enforcer Headquarters, [claire.speech(so I was able to hide behind some crates and then sneak out after they'd gone.)]

After just a couple of minutes, you're outside and breathing fresh air once again, and after you've thanked her for rescuing you, Claire lets out a little sigh and turns towards you. Placing her hands on her hips, she says, [claire.speech(I hate to leave you like this, but I really need to get back and report to my boss that everything's ok. Don't worry, I'm not giving him all the details of what happened in the warehouse. If he found out about you knowing teleport, we'd both be locked up in the cells here...)]

With that, the cat-girl gives you one last smile, before turning and dashing off to get back to work. Having regained your freedom, you wonder what to do now...
